itemDisplayName: ACOM example with VNet, Storage accounts, VMs, NSGs, and UDRs.
description: This template shows how to create a VNet with three subnets, two storage accounts, and several front end and backend VMs in the subnets, a DMZ with a virtual appliance using UDR, and NSGs.
summary: This template creates a VNet with three subnets, two storage accounts, multiple VMs in each subnet, NSGs, and UDRs.
